name: 完美电路 Electric Circuit
description:
[you need some knowledge about electricity to play this game]
    [Use known Value and formulas to make voltage value or current value be constant]
    [Drag right item in right place to make the circuit perfect]
    [If you make this game all finished, you can solve questions about circuit of high school physics easily]
    [This is a difficult game, so you need to think about if you realy want to play this game before you buy it]
